cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)
project(ogdf-user-example CXX)

# Set the C++ standard to C++17
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)

set(OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH CACHE PATH "")

find_package(OGDF CONFIG PATHS ${OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH})
if(NOT OGDF_FOUND)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "No OGDF configuration for CMake has been found. "
    "Please set OGDF_CONFIG_SEARCH_PATH such that ogdf-config.cmake (generated by your OGDF build) can be found.")
endif()

add_executable(config_1_uniform_draw_pla.exe config_1_uniform_draw_pla.cpp)
target_include_directories(config_1_uniform_draw_pla.exe PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(config_1_uniform_draw_pla.exe OGDF)

add_executable(config_1_uniform.exe config_1_uniform.cpp)
target_include_directories(config_1_uniform.exe PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(config_1_uniform.exe OGDF)

add_executable(config_2_draw_pla.exe config_2_draw_pla.cpp)
target_include_directories(config_2_draw_pla.exe PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(config_2_draw_pla.exe OGDF)

add_executable(config_2.exe config_2.cpp)
target_include_directories(config_2.exe PRIVATE ${OGDF_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(config_2.exe OGDF)
